陝.definition: abbr. for Shaanxi 陝西|陕西 province

陝北.definition: Shanbei, northern Shaanxi province, including Yulin 榆林 and Yan'an 延安, a Holy Land of Mao's revolution 革命聖地|革命圣地

陝西.definition: see 陝西省|陕西省[Shan3xi1 Sheng3]

陝西大地震.definition: the great Shaanxi earthquake of 2nd February 1556 that killed 830,000 people

陝西師範大學.pinyin: shǎn xī shī fàn dà xué

陝西省.definition: Shaanxi Province, capital Xi'an 西安市[Xi1an1 Shi4] (abbr. to 陝|陕[Shan3] or 秦[Qin2])

陝西科技大學.pinyin: shǎn xī kē jì dà xué
陝西科技大學.definition: Shaanxi University of Science and Technology
